entry.title: From Smallville with Love
entry.summary:
Author: anxiousdepressedintrovert

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 122,728Chapters: 36/?Kudos: 502

Summary: When a spacecraft crashes on a quiet Kansas farm, Jor-El—refugee of a dead world—arrives with his infant son in tow. Taken in by the Kents, Jor-El must learn what it means to be human while raising a child destined for greatness. What will the people of Smallville have to say about the unusual throuple?

entry.title: Cryptomnesia
entry.summary:
Author: CurlyQ

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,675Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Where Bruce Wayne is a rich detective and Clark Kent just want to be a fly on his wall. Bruce Wayne has it all: a solid career, a family fortune, but what happens when a huge conspiracy falls into his lap and he suddenly finds himself in a load of trouble, biting off way more than he can chew? He asks Clark Kent, or rather, Clark Kent asks him. A bright spot in his dark world, a metaphorical silver lining. Can this Clark Kent kid keep up when the tough gets going? (ratings may change as chapters get updated)

entry.title: A New Dawn for Kal—El (Clark Wayne)
entry.summary:
Author: WriterDMathis

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,109Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Sequel to Luminous Fragments From The Veil Above. After the fall of his homeworld, Kal—El begins his new life on Earth, adopted by Bruce Wayne and his four sons. As he discovers Earth, its strange customs, and the warmth of a new family, he also finds love with Bruce—and a home he never thought he’d have. And his Earth name is known as Clark. Clark Wayne.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 189,412Chapters: 36/?Kudos: 340

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: A Kryptonian Sun
entry.summary:
Author: EJ_Rambles

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,578Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 77

Summary: The child stopped what he was doing- which Clark can now see was slicing his sword through training bots, quickly turning to Batman. He sheathed his sword, taking a step forward, “Father.” Clark felt his brain short circuit. Father? Clark felt his head pound- and not just from the kryptonite. He had been flirting with a married man. A presumably married man. A widower? Whichever- Clark had been flirting with a father- who he didn’t even know was a father. ------- Or; Clark finding out that Bruce has a child, somehow getting asked on a date anyway, and becoming a father figure to said child.

entry.title: Keep the Matches away from the Sunflower

Author: DiamondBat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,930Chapters: 13/16Kudos: 374

Summary: Batman and Superman have a love/hate relationship going on due to some misunderstandings and unexpressed emotions. With no other way of dealing with the unresolved tension, both of them end up on the same dating app. From there, a romance blossoms that neither of them expected or have any way of escaping. (I originally started this with Batfleck x Cavill Superman in mind and still picture this pairing strongly. However, after watching the new Superman movie, I am now conflicted and can see this working with Corensupes and whatever Batman the reader wants to pair him with.
